content.title: Introduction
content.sortContent: AngularJS is a JavaScript framework. It is a library written in JavaScript. AngularJS is distributed as a JavaScript file, and can be added to a web page with a script tag.

content.title: Expressions
content.sortContent: AngularJS expressions are written inside double braces. AngularJS expressions binds data to HTML the same way as the ng-bind directive.

content.title: Directives
content.sortContent:
AngularJS directives are extended HTML attributes with the prefix ng-.
The ng-app directive initializes an AngularJS application.
The ng-init directive initializes application data.
The ng-model directive binds the value of HTML controls (input, select, textarea) to application data.

content.title: Controllers
content.sortContent:
AngularJS applications are controlled by controllers.
The ng-controller directive defines the application controller.
A controller is a JavaScript Object, created by a standard JavaScript object constructor.

content.title: Filters
content.sortContent:
Filters can be added to expressions and directives using a pipe character ( '|' ).
AngularJS filters can be used to transform data: currency, filter, lowercase, orderBy, uppercase.

content.title: Http
content.sortContent: $http is an AngularJS service for reading data from remote servers.

content.title: Tables
content.sortContent: The ng-repeat directive is perfect for displaying tables.

content.title: SQL
content.sortContent: With the code from the chapter $http, it can used to read from databases.

content.title: DOM
content.sortContent: AngularJS has directives for binding application data to the attributes of HTML DOM elements.

content.title: Events
content.sortContent: AngularJS has its own HTML events directives.

content.title: Modules
content.sortContent:
An AngularJS module defines an application.
A module is a container for the different parts of an application.
All application controllers should belong to a module.

content.title: Forms
content.sortContent: An AngularJS form is a collection of input controls.

content.title: Validation
content.sortContent: AngularJS forms and controls can validate input data.

content.title: API
content.sortContent:
The AngularJS Global API is a set of global JavaScript functions for performing common tasks like:
  • Comparing objects
  • Iterating objects
  • Converting data
The Global API functions are accessed using the angular object.

content.title: Bootstrap
content.sortContent: Bootstrap is a popular style sheet. This chapter demonstrates how to use it with AngularJS.

content.title: Includes
content.sortContent: With AngularJS, you can include HTML content, using the ng-include directive

content.title: Application
content.sortContent: It is time to create a real AngularJS Single Page Application (SPA).
